messages.subject: Ukiyo-e discussion group now includes other Fine Japanese arts.
messages.msgSnippet: Friends, just a quick notice to let you all know that we have expanded the new ukiyo-e discussion group to include all Japanese Fine Arts, eg lacquer,
messages.messageBody:
Friends, just a quick notice to let you all know that we have expanded
the new ukiyo-e discussion group to include all Japanese Fine Arts, eg
lacquer, paintings, inro, metalwork etc etc etc.

Currently there are 64 members, with approx 350 messages posted so far,
since the beginning less than a month ago. If you are interested in
Ukiyo-e or other Japanese fine arts and have not joined up yet, you
should.

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/ukiyo_e/

Regards, Matthew.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
